effect.ruby_sapphire: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The user becomes soaked to raise resistance to fire.
flavor_text.emerald: The user becomes soaked to raise resistance to fire.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Weakens FIRE-type attacks while the user is in the battle.
